thread.section_title: Villa Brunel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Well located but...
thread.title_full: Well located but... - Review of Villa Brunel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: carlosgulo
title: Well located but...
text: The hotel is well located, it's about 800m far from Arc the triumph. Wonderful breakfast and room. There is Wi-Fi available from everywhere in the hotel. We had some problems, the shower didn't heat water in one day, the manager increased extra fee for my child (even when we informed his age, previously by email and they confirmed the prices). All other things were perfect!!!!
